activities: The offer and award of franchises to individuals residing in the EU.  Marketing and promotion of franchises to individuals residing in the EU. Marketing and promotion of franchise placement and business coaching services to individuals interested in business ownership through the frachising model.
personaldata: All personal data received from individuals, whether through electronic or other means is covered by the Privacy Policy and Safe Harbor frameworks.
recoursemech: Compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution (EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner)
